trans-unit.note: Standard text in a composer block
trans-unit.target: Quandocunque tu te connecte a un sito web, un DNS (systema de nomine de dominio) primo muta le nomine de dominio (p. ex. www.mozilla.org) in un adresse IP, que permitte a tu traffico internet de attinger ille destination. Typicamente, tu ISP (fornitor de servicio internet) te forni de un servitor de DNS que tu apparatos usa automaticamente.
trans-unit.source: Whenever you connect to a website, a DNS (domain name system) first turns the domain name (e.g. www.mozilla.org) into an IP address that allows your internet traffic to reach that destination. Typically, your ISP (internet service provider) provides you with a DNS server that your devices use automatically.

trans-unit.note: Standard text in a composer block
trans-unit.target: Mozilla VPN te permitte de eliger servitores de DNS alternative que pote offerer te un ulterior strato de protection. In particular, tu pote eliger un servitor de DNS que blocara avisos publicitari, illo que blocara traciatores, o illo que blocara ambes. Al fin, tu pote mesmo vader plus ultra e specificar un servitor de DNS personalisate.
trans-unit.source: Mozilla VPN allows you to choose alternative DNS servers that can offer you an additional layer of protection. In particular, you can choose a DNS server that will block ads, one that will block trackers, or one that will block both. Lastly, you can even go further and specify a custom DNS server.

trans-unit.note: Standard text in a composer block
trans-unit.target: Nota que blocar avisos publicitari e traciatores per le DNS non es un solution perfecte, e que iste protection es melio usate in combination con un navigator que alsi protege tu confidentialitate. Como Mozilla Firefox!
trans-unit.source: Note that blocking ads and trackers using DNS is not a perfect solution and that this protection is best used in combination with a browser that also protects your privacy. Like Mozilla Firefox!

trans-unit.target: Beneficios de usar un DNS personalisate
trans-unit.source: Benefits of using a custom DNS
